Body:
Description: Kindly provide us with the upgrade files to upgrade our air-gapped server from 5.7.1.0 to the latest version.
Thank you for your support.
What We've Learned Updated: Client wishes to upgrade their  air-gapped server from 5.7.1.0 to the latest offline available patch.
Next Steps Updated: Sent them an e-mail with what they need to do along with some recommendations on the best practices for such cases so they won't lose anything.
Next Steps Updated: Client is about to perform the updates. Will wait for their response.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, ECSSR IT
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici

What We've Learned Updated: Hamad joined the remote session and he said there's been a miscommunication between us and his colleagues as he said there's no method of getting into the air gapped server without either a KVM.
We presented the two option that they have, either we can remote through a KVM or we can provide them an offline patch with an additional account where they can access the backend of their EPP server and do the modifications themselves but that would require for him to sign the disclaimer and we would not be responsible for the damages that might occur.
Hamad and us agreed to proceed rather with the KVM option and he said it will take some time to get the proper approval and we just agreed to close the case as soon as he replies back and will open a new one when the time comes.
Next Steps Updated: Waiting for Hamad to get  back to me.
